title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Missouri Exhibits
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     Missouri Exhibits                 Missouri Exhibits       Travel the trail by reading exhibits in towns across Missouri, Kansas, Colorado, Oklahoma, and New Mexico. The eastern edge of the trail began in Franklin, Missouri. The route played a major role in bringing people, goods, and ideas to and from Santa Fe for 60 years. McCoy Park Minor Park New Santa Fe Cemetery       Independence, Missouri was a crossroads for the Santa Fe, California, and Oregan trails in the 1800s. Five exhibits in McCoy Park in Independence document the hustle and bustle of activity that happened.         BACK TO EXHIBITS PAGE
